text: <in~a {l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ wahaAjaruwA@ waja`haduwA@ bi>amowa`lihimo wa>anfusihimo fiY sabiyli {ll~ahi wa{l~a*iyna 'aAwawA@ w~anaSaruw^A@ >uw@la`^}ika baEoDuhumo >awoliyaA^'u baEoDK wa{l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ walamo yuhaAjiruwA@ maA lakum m~in wala`yatihim m~in $aYo'K Hat~aY` yuhaAjiruwA@ wa<ini {sotanSaruwkumo fiY {ld~iyni faEalayokumu {ln~aSoru <il~aA EalaY` qawomK] bayonakumo wabayonahum m~iyva`qN wa{ll~ahu bimaA taEomaluwna baSiyrN
